name: Curse of the Spookz: Hidden Island
name_original: Curse of the Spookz: Hidden Island
description:
Curse of the Spookz: Hidden Island!

You have been shipwrecked after a furious battle with some rival pirates!

Explore the island to find clues, uncover mysteries, discover hidden treasures and avoid the Spookz!

This is a short single level game created for the Messy Spooky Game Jam on Halloween by a small 2 person team over the course of 3 days. 

Created live on https://www.twitch.tv/irishJohnGaming

We hope to expand on this game and add more levels, puzzles, even some combat in future!

For any feedback or support just add a comment here, or come to our discord: https://discord.com/invite/FTFhCM5

We have created this to be playable by all ages, but beware, there are some scary elements so Parental Guidance is advised!

Hope you enjoy & have a fantastic halloweeeeeeeeeen
- John & Mels

Controls:
W, A, S, D to move around.
Space to Jump.
Shift to run.
M for Map (if you have a map!).
